General.Name: Jiangsu Hongdou Industrial Co Ltd
General.Description: Jiangsu Hongdou Industrial Co.,LTD manufactures and sells clothing products. Its clothing products include men's suits, shirts, trousers, jackets, t-shirts, sweaters, and professional wear. Jiangsu Hongdou Industrial Co.,LTD was founded in 1995 and is based in Wuxi, China.
General.Address: Building A, Hongdou Fortune Plaza, Wuxi, China, 214105
